sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Registry Tampering by Potentially Suspicious Processes
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects suspicious registry modifications made by suspicious processes such as script engine processes such as WScript, or CScript etc.
These processes are rarely used for legitimate registry modifications, and their activity may indicate an attempt to modify the registry
without using standard tools like regedit.exe or reg.exe, potentially for evasion and persistence.

mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: Creates a process in a suspended state, likely for injection
Found WSH timer for Javascript or VBS script (likely evasive script)

signature_matches.name: stealth_timeout
signature_matches.description: Possible date expiration check, exits too soon after checking local time

signature_matches.name: language_check_registry
signature_matches.description: Checks system language via registry key (possible geofencing)

signature_matches.name: creates_suspended_process
signature_matches.description: Creates a process in a suspended state, likely for injection

signature_matches.name: antivm_generic_disk
signature_matches.description: Queries information on disks, possibly for anti-virtualization
Program does not show much activity (idle)
Sample tries to load a library which is not present or installed on the analysis machine, adding the library might reveal more behavior
Found WSH timer for Javascript or VBS script (likely evasive script)
Sigma detected: WScript or CScript Dropper
match_data: Data: Command: C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe "C:\Users\user\Desktop\script.js", CommandLine: C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe "C:\Users\user\Desktop\script.js", CommandLine|base64offset|contains: , I

signature_matches.description: Sigma detected: WSF/JSE/JS/VBA/VBE File Execution Via Cscript/Wscript
match_data: Data: Command: C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe "C:\Users\user\Desktop\script.js", CommandLine: C:\Windows\System32\WScript.exe "C:\Users\user\Desktop\script.js", CommandLine|base64offset|contains: , I

T1055.description: Creates a process in a suspended state, likely for injection
